Summary: driving down road and saw a very slow moving boomerang shaped craft pass closely overhead.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Chattanooga
There were no other sightings in Chattanooga on or around April 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI am a security officer in chattanooga, tennessee and a couple of months ago I was on post at chattanooga boiler and tank inc. In the 11:00 hour one night I was conducting a mobile patrol in my car, when I looked up and saw a collection of lights about 2 football fields away from me. I thought it was a helicopter but there were no small blinking lights like terrestrial air vehicles are supposed to have. It started moving toward me and I got a feeling that this vehicle was very weird. I got out of my car and I noticed that it was a winged vehicle not a helicopter at all. It was moving very slowly at approximately 50 feet from the ground with absolutely no sound at all. It passed directly overhead and I could see it very well. It was the size of a fighter jet, with a boomerang shape and no back tail, with 5 white lights underneath. I looked for any exaust ports and saw none. I was close enough to it to see that it was metallic, and could not have been a glider. It was also moving very slowly which is just weird. I lost track of it when it went over some trees and buildings. This happened at east main st. and polk st. just outside downtown chattanooga, tennessee in the 11:00 hour at around April 18, 2008. So there has to be more witnesses.
